DataElement.preferredName: Patient Untreated Central Nervous System Disorder Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to determine patient eligibility for clinical trial participation as outlined in the study protocol for questions related to central nervous system disease that has not been treated.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Untreated Central Nervous System Disorder Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A finding of central nervous system neoplasm that has not been treated._Diseases of any component of the brain (including the cerebral hemispheres, diencephalon, brain stem, and cerebellum) or the spinal cord._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Untreated Central Nervous System Neoplasm Central Nervous System Disorder Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A finding of central nervous system neoplasm that has not been treated.:Diseases of any component of the brain (including the cerebral hemispheres, diencephalon, brain stem, and cerebellum) or the spinal cord.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A finding of central nervous system neoplasm that has not been treated.
A non-neoplastic or neoplastic disorder which affects the brain and/or spinal cord.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: If patient has asymptomatic t
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has asymptomatic treated CNS metastases are all of the criteria for untreated CNS disease met as well as the following: Radiographic demonstration of improvement upon the completion of CNS-directed therapy and no evidence of interim progression between the completion of CNS-directed therapy and the screening radiographic study; No stereotactic radiation or whole-brain radiation within 28 days prior to Cycle 1, Day 1; Screening CNS radiographic study greater than or equal to 4 weeks from completion of radiotherapy and greater than or equal to 2 weeks from discontinuation of corticosteroids?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has asymptomatic treated CNS metastases are all of the criteria listed above met as well as the following:  Radiographic demonstration of improvement upon the completion of CNS-directed therapy and no evidence of interim progression between the completion of CNS-directed therapy and the screening radiographic study; No stereotactic radiation or whole-brain radiation within 28 days prior to Cycle 1, Day 1;  Screening CNS radiographic study greater than or equal to 4 weeks from completion of radiotherapy and greater than or equal to 2 weeks from discontinuation of corticosteroids.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have known symptomatic, untreated central nervous system (including brain, spinal cord)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have known symptomatic, untreated central nervous system metastases (including brain and spinal cord metastasis)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has asymptomatic treated CNS metastases are all of the criteria for untreated CNS disease met as well as the following: Radiographic demonstration of improvement upon the completion of CNS-directed therapy and no evidence of interim progression between the completion of CNS-directed therapy and the screening radiographic study; No stereotactic radiation or whole-brain radiation within 28 days prior initiation of study treatment; Screening CNS radiographic study greater than or equal to 4 weeks from completion of radiotherapy and greater than or equal to 2 weeks from discontinuation of corticosteroids?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have untreated central nervous system (CNS) metastatic disease, leptomeningeal disease or cord compression?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have known, untreated brain metastases or leptomeningeal metastases?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has asymptomatic, treated CNS disease, has the treating physician determined that immediate CNS specific treatment is not required and is unlikely to be required during the first cycle of therapy and the following criteria are met: radiographic demonstration of clinical stability upon the completion of CNS-directed therapy and no evidence of interim progression between the completion of CNS-directed therapy and the screening radiographic study done greater than or equal to 4 weeks from completion of radiotherapy and greater than or equal to 2 weeks from discontinuation of corticosteroids and patient has not received  stereotactic radiation or whole-brain radiation within 28 days prior to randomization?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have untreated central nervous system (CNS) metastases?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient has stable, treated, asymptomatic brain metastases (active brain metastases) or leptomeningeal disease, has the treating physician determined that immediate CNS specific treatment is not required and is unlikely to be required during the first cycle of therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has asymptomatic treated CNS metastases, are all of the criteria for untreated CNS disease met as well as the following: Radiographic demonstration of improvement upon the completion of CNS-directed therapy and no evidence of interim progression between the completion of CNS-directed therapy and the screening radiographic study; No stereotactic radiation or whole-brain radiation within 28 days prior to Cycle 1, Day 1; Screening CNS radiographic study greater than or equal to 4 weeks from completion of radiotherapy and greater than or equal to 2 weeks from discontinuation of corticosteroids?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have presence of an untreated or progressive symptomatic CNS melanoma metastases?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has asymptomatic treated CNS metastases have all of the following been met: radiographic demonstration of improvement upon the completion of CNS directed therapy and no evidence of interim progression between the completion of CNS directed therapy and the screening radiographic study; no stereotactic radiation or whole-brain radiation within 28 days prior to Randomization; screening CNS radiographic study greater than or equal to 4 weeks from completion of radiotherapy and greater than or equal to 2 weeks from discontinuation of corticosteroids; follow-up brain imaging 3 months after central nervous system (CNS)-directed therapy shows no evidence of progression?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has a history of treated CNS metastases are the following criteria met:   Radiologically stable for 4 weeks; disease outside the CNS is present;  recovered from acute toxicity associated with the treatment to less than or equal to CTCAE Grade 1 or baseline (with the exception of alopecia), with no requirement for escalating doses of corticosteroids over the past 7 days; if currently taking enzyme-inducing anticonvulsants (EIAC) must be transitioned to non-enzyme inducing anticonvulsants at least 14 days or 5 half-lives prior to the first dose of study medication; no presence of symptomatic or untreated leptomeningeal metastases or spinal cord compression?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has asymptomatic untreated CNS disease, have all of the following criteria been met: evaluable or measurable disease outside the CNS, no metastases to brain stem, midbrain, pons, medulla, or cerebellum, no history of intracranial hemorrhage or spinal cord hemorrhage, no ongoing requirement for dexamethasone for CNS; patients on a stable dose of anticonvulsants are permitted, and no neurosurgical resection or brain biopsy within 28 days prior to Cycle 1, Day 1?
